subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nadia Petrova took advantage of her last-minute addition to the field at the Pilot Pen tournament in New Haven, moving into the final with a 2-6, 6-2, 6-2 win over Maria Kirilenko on Friday.
snippet: Nadia Petrova took advantage of her last-minute addition to the field at the Pilot Pen tournament in New Haven, moving into the final with a 2-6, 6-2, 6-2 win over Maria Kirilenko on Friday.
